name: Dead Sea Bath Salts
description:
Our dead sea bath salts will give you the ultimate spa experience. This salt uses dead sea salt, epsom salt and baking soda. Salts from the Dead Sea have been legendary for centuries for their therapeutic and beatifying properties on the skin. Nothing like regular sea salt, Dead Sea salts are comprised of a wide variety of minerals which are present in a high concentration. Whereas regular sea salts is made up of over 90% sodium, salt from the Dead Sea is only about 10% sodium and the rest is made of minerals which are essential for the proper function and health of skin. Such minerals include Magnesium, Potassium, Bromine and Calcium to name a few.
We have 3 scents:
Cucumber Melon- contains essential oils of cucumber

Get Your Groove Back- contains peach, green apple, chamomile musk, sandalwood, and vanilla

Aching Body-contains lavender, peppermint, and tea tree which intoxicate the senses.
Relaxes tired, achy muscles
Provide an aromatherapeutic benefits

name: Rejuvenating Shea Hair Butter- 4oz
description: Our shea hair butter will rejuvenate your hair. It contains sweet orange and lavender for rejuvenation,cedarwood for itchy scalp, and rosemary to stimulate the scalp and for circulation. This shea butter is 100% unrefined which means it is superior in that it retains all its natural vitamins, especially vitamin A and vitamin E. Shea butter has been used to help heal burns, sores, scars, dermatitis, psoriasis, dandruff, and stretch marks. Shea Butter provides moisture to dry or damaged hair from the roots to the very tips, repairing and protecting against weather damage, dryness and brittleness. It also absorbs quickly and completely into the scalp to rehydrate without clogging pores. It is particularly beneficial for processed and heat-treated hair. It is an excellent treatment for dry scalp. It restores luster to damaged hair. This butter also includes jojoba, sweet almond, olive, and vitamin e.

name: Pure Whipped Mango Butter- 4oz
description:
Our whipped mango butter is so creamy and smells delightful. Mango Butter has natural emollient properties, high oxidative ability, wound healing, and regenerative activity due to its high unsaponiable. Mango butter is used for its skin softening, soothing, moisturizing and protective properties and to restore flexibility and reduce degeneration of skin cells. It has a protective effect against UV radiation. Mango Butter will provide improvements and benefits in all the conditions listed below. 
- Effectively treats dry skin 
- Heals skin rash 
- Heals skin peeling, after tanning 
- Clears blemishes and wrinkles 
- Relieves itching skin 
- Heals sunburn 
- Shaving cream for a smooth shave 
- Treats small skin wounds and skin cracks 
- Moisturizes and smoothes tough or rough skin 
- Fights frost bite 
- Prevents stretch marks during pregnancy 
- Relieves insect bites 
- Promotes healthy rejuvenated skin 
- Heals muscle fatigue, aches and tension 
- Relieves skin allergies such as poison ivy or poison oak 
- Treats eczema and dermatitis 
- Fights off fine lines and wrinkle 
This butter also contains unrefined shea butter, cocoa butter, avocado oil, apricot kernel oil, castor oil, and vitamin e. It is lightly scented with peach. You can choose unscented as well as scented for this butter.

name: Pure Whipped Cocoa Butter- 4oz
description: Our whipped cocoa butter is the skn treat you'll never get tired of. Cocoa butter has been called the ultimate moisturizer, and has been used to keep skin soft and supple. It is one of the most stable, highly concentrated natural fats known, and melts at body temperature so that it is readily absorbed into the skin. Cocoa butter is often recommended for treatment of skin conditions such as eczema and dermatitis. When applied topically, it creates a barrier between sensitive skin and the environment and also helps retain moisture. Pregnant women have long used to cocoa butter formulations to prevent and treat stretch marks. This butter also contains shea butter, avocado butter, olive oil, and vitamin e. It is lightly scented with vanilla and smells scrumptous.

name: Brown Sugar Scrub- 4oz
description:
Our brown sugar scrub is so gentle on the skin. This scrub will make your skin beautiful with a one of a kind glow. Use on your entire body and feel renewed. This scrub also contains , olive oil, aloe vera, glycerin, cocoa butter vitamin e, and the wonderful scents of grapefruit, lavender, lemon, and orange.

Olive oil: Stress, dietary choices, environmental pollutants, medications and exposure to ultra-violet (UV) rays all take a toll on the health of your skin and hair. Olive oil replaces the moisture and elasticity lost to these elements.
